newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean firms pass on tenders of feed by-product.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean firms pass on tenders of feed by-product.

text.p: South Korean feed mill companies passed on tenders for 8,000 tonnes of cottonseed meal and 12,500 tonnes of rapeseed meal due to high prices, traders said on Tuesday.
Traders said the lowest bid for cottonseed meal was at $157.83 per tonne by Toepfer with Chinese origin for shipment in December.
They said the tenders were passed because of higher-than-expected prices, but they declined to give the price level at which the companies wanted to buy.
There were no bids for rapeseed meal, they said.
Cottonseed meal was set for the delivery on December 10, while rapeseed meal on March 20.
